content.question: ​Which of the following is the graph of <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 2 csc open parentheses fraction numerator 2 pi over denominator 3 end fraction x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>csc</mi><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> in the <math alttext="x y"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-plane?

choices.label: All coordinates are approximate. The U-shaped curves appear to be asymptotic to the dashed vertical lines and alternate between open up and open down between consecutive pairs of dashed vertical lines. The dashed vertical lines occur every 3 units at x equals negative 7.5, negative 4.5, negative 1.5, 1.5, 4.5, and 7.5. The U-shaped curves that open up each have a minimum value of y equals 2 midway between the corresponding vertical lines. The U-shaped curves that open down each have a maximum value at y equals negative 2 midway between the corresponding vertical lines. The open up curves occur between x equals negative 7.5 and negative 4.5, then again between x equals negative 1.5 and 1.5, then again between x equals 4.5 and 7.5, and the open down curves occur in the alternate intervals.

All coordinates are approximate. The U-shaped curves appear to be asymptotic to the dashed vertical lines and alternate between open up and open down between consecutive pairs of dashed vertical lines. The dashed vertical lines occur every 1.5 units at x equals negative 0.75 and positive 0.75 and every 1.5 units in both the positive x and negative x directions. The U-shaped curves that open up each have a minimum value of y equals 2 midway between the corresponding vertical lines. The U-shaped curves that open down each have a maximum value at y equals negative 2 midway between the corresponding vertical lines. One open up curve occurs between x equals 0.75 and 0.75. Open up and open down curves alternate between consecutive pairs of dashed vertical lines in the positive x and negative x directions.

All coordinates are approximate. The U-shaped curves appear to be asymptotic to the dashed vertical lines and alternate between open up and open down between consecutive pairs of dashed vertical lines. The dashed vertical lines occur every 3 units at x equals negative 9, negative 6, negative 3, 0, 3, 6, and 9. The U-shaped curves that open up each have a minimum value of y equals 2 midway between the corresponding vertical lines. The U-shaped curves that open down each have a maximum value at y equals negative 2 midway between the corresponding vertical lines. The open up curves occur between x equals negative 6 and negative 3, then again between x equals 0 and 3, then again between x equals 6 and 9, and the open down curves occur in the alternate intervals.

All coordinates are approximate. The U-shaped curves appear to be asymptotic to the dashed vertical lines and alternate between open up and open down between consecutive pairs of dashed vertical lines. The dashed vertical lines occur every 1.5 units at x equals 0 and all multiples of 1.5. The U-shaped curves that open up each have a minimum value of y equals 2 midway between the corresponding vertical lines. The U-shaped curves that open down each have a maximum value at y equals negative 2 midway between the corresponding vertical lines. One open down curve occurs between x equals negative 1.5 and 0. One open up curve occurs between x equals 0 and 1.5. This pattern alternates between consecutive dashed vertical lines.

content.answer: All coordinates are approximate. The U-shaped curves appear to be asymptotic to the dashed vertical lines and alternate between open up and open down between consecutive pairs of dashed vertical lines. The dashed vertical lines occur every 1.5 units at x equals 0 and all multiples of 1.5. The U-shaped curves that open up each have a minimum value of y equals 2 midway between the corresponding vertical lines. The U-shaped curves that open down each have a maximum value at y equals negative 2 midway between the corresponding vertical lines. One open down curve occurs between x equals negative 1.5 and 0. One open up curve occurs between x equals 0 and 1.5. This pattern alternates between consecutive dashed vertical lines.

topic.text: 3.11: The Secant, Cosecant, and Cotangent Functions

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Construct equivalent graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations of functions that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context, with and without technology.
